list.name: Router
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-drivers-media-eth-oper:ethernet-interface/statistics/statistic" WITH KEY="Producer"

list.name: Interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-drivers-media-eth-oper:ethernet-interface/statistics/statistic" WITH KEY="interface-name" WHERE "Producer" =~ /^$Router$/
